des:
Tracking and improving your wellbeing has never been smarter or kinder with the Kindspace skill for Amazon Alexa.
The aim is to help you become more aware of how you are feeling and make it easy to access tips and advice to boost your wellbeing. We also know how difficult it can be to make time for your wellbeing. Our wellness activities are designed to help you take a few minutes each day to focus on your needs and bring you joy. Taking time out for yourself to understand how you are feeling is hugely beneficial for your physical and mental health*.
We are on a mission to create a world where Smart Meets Kind®. Using voice assistants and smart homes to transform people’s lives for the better by creating homes that care for us.

*Disclaimer: The contents of the Kindspace skill, such as text, graphics, sound, images, and other material contained are for informational and educational purposes only. The content is not intended to be a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, treatment, cure or prevention. You must not rely on the information in the Kindspace skill as an alternative to medical advice from your doctor or other professional healthcare provider. Please do not do any of the wellness activities while driving or operating machinery.

How do I start the daily check-in?
"Alexa, ask Kindspace for my daily check-in"
Alexa will ask you to score yourself against four statements. The scoring is on a scale of 1 to 5 where 1=Never, 2=Seldom, 3=Sometimes, 4=Often and 5=Always.

How are the wellbeing scores assessed?
The scores from your responses to the four wellbeing statements are combined. Alexa will give you some feedback on how you are doing.
Your wellbeing assessment from the daily scoring is categorised into four levels: Excellent ≥ 16, Good = 12-15, Fair = 8-11, Low ≤ 7

How do I access the wellbeing tips 
You can also hear our tip of the day. Just say "Alexa, ask Kindspace for the tip of the day" We’ve got lots of advice to enhance your wellbeing. For example just say "Alexa, ask Kindspace for a sleep tip", or choose another of our tip categories which include:
Sleep
Nutrition
Exercise
Mindfulness
Relationship
Personal Growth
Health
Complementary Therapy
You-time
Financial

How do I access the wellness activities? 
Kindspace helps you to take time during your day to focus on your wellbeing with our exclusive wellness activities. Just say "Alexa, ask Kindspace for a wellness activity". Our wellness packages currently include breathing exercises, guided affirmations, poetry, short stories and journaling. The first activity in each of the breathing packages is free, you can sign up for a monthly subscription to unlock the full breathing exercises.

How do I use Custom Tasks?
Open your Alexa app, tap More, Routines, New routine (+ icon), Actions, Skills, Your Skills, Select Kindspace, Enter the desired category of tip or wellness activity you would like.

How do I use Widgets?
From your home page, swipe from the right-hand side to the left. Tap on the button that says ‘Widget Gallery’. You will see all of the widgets available at the moment for you to choose from. Note that there is no search functionality yet as the feature is so new. Scroll until you see the Kindspace widget or the Kindspace Daily Affirmations widget.

Get involved...
We know with voice assistants, one size definitely doesn’t fit all. While we’ve tried to build in plenty of variety, we’d love to know what else you’d like to be able to do in Kindspace - let us know your suggestions at kindspace@tltechsmart.com
Do you have a favourite wellbeing tip that you’d like to share? Let us know at https://createyourkindspace.com/contact/ and we’ll feature it in the skill.

Need more info on how to get the best out of your voice assistant?
Find out more at https://www.tltechsmart.com/help/

And finally…
Please leave a review if you enjoy Kindspace - this helps us to add more content.
